import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' const OrderScreen = ({ match }) => { const orderId = match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetails) const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }, []) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {' '} {order.user.email}

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ) : ( Not Delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Order is empty ) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} {!order.isPaid && ( {loadingPay && } {!sdkReady ? ( ) : ( )} )} {loadingDeliver && } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && order.isPaid && !order.isDelivered && ( )} ) } export default OrderScreen
